product_name: DeFeet Wooleator High Top Bike Socks - Men's
long_description: DeFeet Wooleator High Top bike socks offer the comfort and performance of wool in a thin, ride-ready design with 5 in. tall cuffs. Constructed of lightweight, soft merino wool for enhanced moisture-wicking performance and itch-free comfort; nylon adds durability for long-lasting comfort. Touch of elastic helps socks keep their shape and stretch to move with you. Mesh weave on top of socks and insteps allows feet to breathe. Non-bulky construction ensures a smooth, close fit that maximizes power transfer. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: DeFeet Wooleator High Top bike socks offer the comfort and performance of wool in a thin, ride-ready design with 5 in. tall cuffs.
